Name: Strike
Text: Strike

Name: Move
Text: Maneuver

Name: Defend
Text: Defend

Name: Wind jump
Text: Range 5. Target ally is removed from play. They appear at the start of the next round at any space within Range 5 from you. You may Consume Air to Push 1 all enemies adjacent to them when they appear.

Name: Blow off
Text: Maneuver. Radius 2. Push 2.

Name: Air blade
Text: Consume Air. Range 4. Strike. Inflict 2 Bleed.

Name: Tempest strike
Text: Maneuver. Strike. Maneuver. Channel Air.

Name: Tailwind
Text: Radius 1. Consume Air to increase Radius by 2. All allies may Move 3 and gain Evasive 1.

Name: Billowing
Text: Consume Air. Continuous. Any number of times during your turn, you may discard a card. When you do, Move 1.

Name: Sacrificial stab
Text: Lose 2 Life. Strike. Channel Dark.

Name: Draining touch
Text: Deal 1d6 damage. Consume Dark to gain life equal to damage dealt. Exile.

Name: Release pain
Text: Pay X life. This attack hits allies. Radius X. Deal 4d6 dark damage.

Name: Blood pact
Text: Permanent. End of turn - Lose 2 life and gain Empowered 1.

Name: Murderous aura
Text: Continuous. Radius 1. Whenever an ally attacks, you lose 1 life and they deal an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Shadow's grasp
Text: Range 5. Up to three targets. Deal 1d6 damage and inflict Soft 2. Channel Dark.

Name: Bury
Text: Strike. Target can't move until the end of its next turn. Channel Earth.

Name: Cracking skin
Text: Continuous. Defend. When attacked, create a Size 1 obstacle within Range 3.

Name: Blessing of stone
Text: Consume Earth. Radius 3. All friendly characters gain 5 Block.

Name: Stone cage
Text: Radius 3. Create Size 3 walls around the radius. Inflict Slow 3. While no walls are destroyed and you are inside them, deal an extra 2d6 Earth damage on your attacks.

Name: Pocket cover
Text: Range 2. Create a Size 1 obstacle. Channel Earth.

Name: Dig
Text: Put a card from your discard into your hand.

Name: Reuse
Text: Shuffle any number of cards from your discard into your deck.

Name: Forward strike
Text: Strike. Exile the top card of your deck. You may play it this turn. Channel Fire.

Name: Sear
Text: Range 5. Blast 2. Deal an extra 1d6 damage to any non-bloodied enemies. Deal 1d6 fire damage.

Name: Burn bright
Text: Draw three cards. Consume Fire to play a card costing 1 or less from your hand for free.

Name: Blazing armament
Text: Continuous. Range 3. Target ally deals an extra 1d6 Fire damage.

Name: Cauterize
Text: Deal 1 Fire damage. Target loses all Bleed. Draw a card.

Name: Engulf in flames
Text: Range 3. Inflict Burn on target ally. Their next attack gains Radius 1 and deals an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Frost aura
Text: Permanent. Whenever an enemy starts their turn next to you, they gain Slow 1. Channel Ice.

Name: Snow day
Text: Radius 3. Create difficult terrain. Consume Ice to deal 1d6 Ice damage.

Name: Frost strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Slow 2. Channel Ice.

Name: Frost beam
Text: Consume Ice. Line 4. Deal 3d6 damage. Create difficult terrain.

Name: Skating
Text: Continuous. Radius 5. Friendly characters ignore movement cost increase on difficult terrain. When they end their turn on difficult terrain, they gain 2 Block.

Name: Ice armor
Text: Opener. Defend. Gain Slow 1. Channel Ice.

Name: Balance
Text: Stance. Whenever you Strike, gain 1 Barrier. Whenever you Defend, your next attack deals an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Bestow armor
Text: Range 5. Target gains 5 Block. Channel Light.

Name: Soft wrappings
Text: Target gains 2 Barrier. You may Consume Light to Heal 2 instead. Target draws a card. Exile.

Name: Light strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Pulse 3. Channel Light.

Name: Reveal
Text: Range 5. Target ally searches their deck for a card and puts it into their hand. You may consume Light to target a second ally. Exile.

Name: Smite
Text: Consume Light. Range 10. Ignores line of sight. Deal 2d6 light damage. Inflict Pulse 2.

Name: Gleaming strike
Text: Scan, then Strike the target.

Name: Disect
Text: Strike. If you defeat the enemy, search your deck for a card and put it on top of your deck.

Name: Chain lightning
Text: Range 5. Deal 3d6 lightning damage. Another target within Range 3 takes 2d6 lightning  damage. Another target within Range 3 from the second target takes 1d6 lightning damage. Channel Lightning.

Name: Shocking wave
Text: Radius 1. You may consume Lightning to increase radius by 2. Deal 2d6 lightning damage to all other characters.

Name: Crackling
Text: Permanent. Start of turn - gain 2 Counter. Your counter deals Lightning damage.

Name: Distracting strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Distracted until the end of its turn.

Name: Spectacle
Text: Affects all enemies in line of sight. Inflict Distracted until the end of their turn. Consume Lightning to gain 3 Counter.

Name: Wreathe in Electricity
Text: Consume Lightning. Radius 3. All allies gain 4 Counter.

Name: Lightning bolt
Text: Consume Lightning. Line 5. Affects allies and enemies. Deal 4d6 damage and inflict 3 Sundered.

Name: Venomous strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Poison 3. Channel Nature.

Name: Poison plants
Text: Range 3. Create 2 Size 2 obstacles. Enemies starting their turn adjacent to them gain Poison 2 and Slow 1.

Name: Natural remedy
Text: Consume Nature. Target recovers 2 Health and removes up to one condition. Exile.

Name: Poison coating
Text: Permanent. Your attacks inflict 1 Poison.

Name: Soothe plant
Text: Range 6. Create a Size 1 obstacle. When a friendly character ends their turn next to it, they remove up to 1 condition or status card from their hand.

Name: Toxiburst
Text: Range 5. Blast 1. Inflict 2 Soft, 1 Slow and 1 Poison. Channel Nature.

Name: Clarity
Text: Draw cards until you have 6 in hand. Channel Water

Name: Current
Text: Range 5. Move target up to 3. The area it moves over turns into difficult terrain that moves a character ending their turn there the same direction and spaces.

Name: Geyser strike
Text: Strike. Push 1. If the space the target was on is empty, it becomes water terrain that cannot be walked on.

Name: Drink
Text: Consume Water. Draw 2 cards.

Name: Waterport
Text: Range 7. Swap positions of any two characters.

Name: Wave of thought
Text: Radius 5. Each ally draws a card. You may consume Water to move them 2 towards you.

Name: Run
Text: Maneuver +2.

Name: Slink
Text: Maneuver -1. Draw 1

Name: Running reload
Text: Maneuver. Reload 2.

Name: Easy reposition
Text: Maneuver.

Name: Easy step
Text: Maneuver, ignoring difficult terrain and height.

Name: Jump
Text: Maneuver. You may move up. You may play a card as you descend. If you strike as you descend, deal an extra 2d6 damage.

Name: Flick
Text: Range 3. Deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Refine
Text: Continuous. Your attacks deal +X damage, where X is the number of times you've played this card this combat.

Name: Blade dig
Text: Draw a card. Repeat this process until you draw a non-attack card.

Name: Lengthy strike
Text: Line 3. Strike. Push 1.

Name: Bursting strike
Text: Burst 2. Strike.

Name: Unload
Text: Strike with an Ammo weapon until you run out of Ammo. You may not reload with these strikes.

Name: Lucky roll
Text: Reaction - any die is rolled. Change the die up or down by 1.

Name: Heart of the cards
Text: Play the top card of your deck for free, then exile it.

Name: All in
Text: The next time you attack, roll 1d6. On 4+, deal double damage. Otherwise, deal no damage.

Name: Thoughtful strike
Text: Strike. You may consume Water or Light. Radius 3. Each ally may draw a card.

Name: Stone cold defense
Text: Defend. You may consume Ice or Earth. Radius 3. Each ally gains 3 Block.

Name: Creeping tendrils
Text: Range 5. Deal 1d6 damage to up to 3 targets. You may consume Nature or Dark. If you do, recover half of the damage roll health.

Name: Blitz
Text: Line 5. Deal 1d6 damage to each target moved through.. You may consume Lightning or Air. Move to the end of the line.

Name: Bursting
Text: Consume Lightning or Fire. Radius 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Gain 2 Counter.

Name: Mass expulsion
Text: Radius 3. Inflict 3 Pulse on each character. You may consume Light or Fire. Radius 3. Trigger Pulse on each character and reduce it by 1.

Name: Beast form
Text: Stance. You may not use weapons to strike. Your Strike becomes “Deal 2d6 damage. Deal 1d6 damage.” You gain 3 Block at the start of each turn. Your attacks deal an extra 1d6 against non-bloodied enemies.

Name: Flicker blow
Text: Strike. Teleport 3 to be adjacent to another target. Strike that target.

Name: Melt legs
Text: Range 5. Burst 2. Inflict 2 Soft and 2 Slow.

Name: Control magic
Text: Range 5. You control the target on their next turn.

Name: Chromatic strike
Text: Strike. Inflict 3 of a random status effect - d6 - 1-2 Bleed, 3-4 Poison, 5-6 Pulse.

Name: Prod fortune
Text: Radius 6. For each character, inflict them with 3 of a random status effect d6 1 Counter, 2 Soft 3 Barrier 4 Bleed 5 Poison 6 Pulse

Name: Reload
Text: Reload 3.

Name: Hot reload
Text: Reload 1. Draw a card. Gain 2 Pulse.

Name: Demand
Text: Continuous. Range 5. Target enemy must target you with all abilities if able as long as it starts its turn within range.

Name: Be loud
Text: Continuous. Radius 3. Each enemy must target you if able.

Name: Drawing stance
Text: Stance. Radius 3. Each enemy must target you if able.

Name: Vanguard's assault
Text: Strike. If you are bloodied, Defend. Gain 3 Counter.

Name: Probing blow
Text: Scan target within Strike range, then Strike or Draw 2 cards.

Name: Singe brain
Text: Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 Burn.

Name: Toxic lesson
Text: Range 3. Inflict 3 Poison to target friendly character. They draw 2 cards.

Name: Charge
Text: Maneuver. Strike an adjacent enemy.

Name: Deflect
Text: Reaction - you are attacked by a non-adjacent enemy. Redirect the attack to any other target within Range 3.

Name: Nothingness strike
Text: Discard two cards. If you do, Strike.

Name: Unceasing
Text: Permanent. When you have no cards in hand, lose 1 life and draw a card.

Name: Siphon mind
Text: Radius 5. Each character discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way. Channel Dark.

Name: Use waste
Text: Stance. Whenever you discard a card, gain 1 Block.

Name: Deadzone
Text: Radius 3. For each enemy, teleport to that enemy, then Strike them.

Name: Blade rush
Text: Line 3. Strike and inflict 3 Bleed, then move to the end of the line.

Name: Attack of oportunity
Text: Reaction - An adjacent enemy moves. Strike that enemy.

Name: Beat down
Text: Reaction - an ally attacks an adjacent enemy. Strike that enemy and inflict 2 Soft.

Name: Reflect projectile
Text: Reaction - a non-adjacent enemy attacks you. Gain resistance to the attack and damage the attacker for the same amount.

Name: Swift block
Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Defend.

Name: Bloody twirl
Text: Lose 2 Life. Strike. If you are bloodied, the attack gains Radius 1.

Name: Evasive strike
Text: Strike. Gain 1 Evasive.

Name: Mark target
Text: Range 5. Permanent. Attacks against the target deal 1d6 extra damage. When the target dies, exile.

Name: Time walk
Text: Take an extra turn after this one. Finisher. Exile.

Name: Shell
Text: Continuous. Radius 3. Allies deal 3 more damage.

Name: Follow-up
Text: Continuous. Once per turn, when an ally attacks an enemy within range 3, you may deal 1d3 damage to that enemy. If you're adjacent to the enemy, deal 1d6 damage instead.

Name: Power in pain
Text: Lose 2 Life. Gain 1 Strength

Name: Empowering Blow
Text: Strike. Radius 3. Each ally gains 1 Empowered. If you defeat the enemy, they gain another 1 Empowered.

Name: Black hole
Text: Range 6, Burst 3. All elements are consumed. Pull all targets as close to the center as possible. Deal 5d6 damage. Gain 1 Nihil. Exile.

Name: Cover
Text: Reaction - an ally within range 3 is attacked. Swap spaces with that ally and take the attack in their place.

Name: Calling the Doves down to the sinners and allowing the bliss to flow
Text: Deal 1 damage to any target regardless of range or line of sight. Repeat 107 times. Gain 3 Wounds.

Name: Pointy tossaways
Text: Stance. Whenever you discard a card, Range 3 - deal 1 damage.

Name: Endless blades
Text: Stance. Once per turn, you may deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Indiscriminate pulsation
Text: Stance. Your Pulse deals damage to all characters in the radius.

Name: Grit
Text: Permanent. When you would be defeated, gain a wound and remain at 1 Health instead. Then, exile this.

Name: My beating, exposed heart
Text: Stance. At the end of your turn Radius 3 - you and all enemies gain 1 Vulnerable.

Name: Defensive antidote
Text: Defend. Remove all Poison from any character.

Name: Gushing guard
Text: Defend. If you have any Bleed, Radius 3 - Inflict 3 Bleed, trigger Bleed damage on each character, then reduce Bleed by 1.

Name: Insightful defend
Text: Defend. Radius 1. Each friendly character draws a card.

Name: Horde holder
Text: Continuous. Your zone of control is increased by 2. Whenever a character enters your zone of control, Defend.

Name: Pulsing guard
Text: Continuous. Defend. Whenever you are attacked, gain 1 Pulse. Your Pulse deals damage to enemies.

Name: Bleeding guard
Text: Defend. Gain 2 Bleed.

Name: Inviting defense
Text: Defend. Any enemy regardless of distance may Move 2, then attack you with a basic attack.

Name: Reusing guard
Text: Exile the top card of your deck. Defend X times, where X is its cost.

Name: Sleight of hand
Text: Draw a card, then put a card on top of your deck.

Name: Shield the wounded
Text: Radius 3. Defend, allies gaining all effects of your Defend too. This costs 1 less for each Bloodied friendly character within range.

Name: Wound
Text: Unplayable.

Name: Bladestorm
Text: Continuous. Whenever you Strike, deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Teaching waters
Text: Range 5. An ally draws 5 cards. Channel Water.

Name: Divesting order
Text: Exile the top 2 cards of your deck. Range 3 - target ally Strikes.

Name: Offense order
Text: Radius 3. All friendly characters may Strike an adjacent character.

Name: Targeted destruction
Text: Range 5. Any number of allies may Strike the target.

Name: Breaking combo
Text: Strike. Push 1, then Move 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Inflict 3 Soft. Radius 1 - Strike.

Name: Trusting motion
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an attack, gain 1 Strength and Strike. If it's a Move, gain 2 Haste and Maneuver. If it's a Defend, gain 3 Hard and Defend. Otherwise, gain 1 Energy and draw a card.

Name: Elementor
Text: Stance. Whenever you consume an element, you may have an ally within range 3 deal +1d6 damage and their damage is of that type.

Name: Guard
Text: Range 3. Defend, the target gaining the effects of your Defend.

Name: Opportune strike
Text: Replenish. Strike. Discard a card.

Name: Liminal flow
Text: Consume Dark and Light. Continuous. Radius 3 - Friendly characters' attacks deal +1d6 damage and deal Dark or Light damage of your choice. Whenever they defeat an enemy, they recover 1 Health.

Name: Burning frost
Text: Consume Fire and Ice. Continuous. Radius 3 - Whenever an enemy starts or ends their turn, inflict 2 Slow and 4 Pulse.

Name: Shadow call
Text: Range 3 - Create a Shade (3 HP). It deals 1d6 damage. Consume Dark - each Shade moves 2, then deals 1d6 damage.

Name: Summon Golem
Text: Permanent. Range 3 - Summon a Golem (15 HP, Size 2, Immune to Poison and Bleed). It deals 2d6 damage. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Energy. When you do, the summoned Golem moves 2, then deals 2d6 damage and you may consume Ice or Earth to have the Golem gain 5 Block. When the Golem is defeated, Exile this.

Name: Guide creation
Text: Range 5. Target summoned ally recovers 3 health, may move 2 and its next attack deals +1d6 damage. Channel Light.

Name: Summon Elemental
Text: Permanent. Consume Fire or Lightning. Range 3 - Summon an Elemental (8 HP). At the end of your turn it moves 4, gains 3 Counter and deals 2d6 damage.

Name: Barrier potion
Text: Replenish. Gain 5 Barrier. Consumable 3.

Name: Bandages
Text: Replenish. Remove all Bleed from a friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Antidote
Text: Replenish. Remove all Poison from a Friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Dampener
Text: Replenish. Remove all Pulse from a Friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Strength potion
Text: Replenish. Gain 2 Strength. Consumable 3.

Name: Strand of wind
Text: Replenish. Gain 1 Evasive. Consumable 3.

Name: Throwing dagger
Text: Replenish. Range 3. Deal 1d6 damage. Consumable 3.

Name: Blade ring
Text: Replenish. Radius 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Consumable 3.

Name: Stone of elements
Text: Replenish. Channel any element. Consumable 3.

Name: Prayer - Fire
Text: Choose one - Channel Fire or Consume Fire - Range 3. Target ally gains 1 Strength and may Strike.

Name: Prayer - Earth
Text: Choose one - Channel Earth or Consume Earth - Range 3. Target ally gains 2 Hard and may Defend.

Name: Shroud
Text: Reaction - an adjacent ally is attacked. They gain 1 Evasive.

Name: Stormburst
Text: Consume Lightning. Strike. Then, Strike each target that has block within Burst 3 from the target. Inflict 3 Sundered.

Name: Bloody Strength
Text: Radius 3. Each ally gains 1 Empowered and 3 Bleed.

Name: There and back again
Text: Maneuver. At the end of this turn, you may Maneuver.

Name: Bring forth
Text: Maneuver twice. Range 8 - teleport an ally to a space adjacent to you.

Name: Run ragged
Text: Maneuver. Gain 3 Bleed.

Name: Call the spring Fairy
Text: Summon a Fairy (3 HP, flying). Consume Air - each Fairy may move 5. Consume Light - Each ally adjacent to a Fairy gains 1 barrier.

Name: Call the autumn Fairy
Text: Summon a Fairy (3 HP, flying). Consume Water - each Fairy may push 2. Consume Dark - Each Fairy deals 1d3 damage.

Name: Devour
Text: Destroy an adjacent Summon. You recover 2 health and gain 1 energy.

Name: Burst of Wind
Text: You may consume Air to ignore height, terrain and zone of control for this movement.

Name: Untouchable dash
Text: Gain 2 Haste. Maneuver. Gain 1 Evasive for each adjacent enemy.

Name: Imperceptable movement
Text: The next time you would move this turn, teleport instead. Gain 1 Haste.

Name: Forgetful run
Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Each player may discard up to two cards.

Name: Toss balast
Text: Discard 2 cards. If you do, Maneuver.

Name: Already there
Text: Teleport to any space on the map. Costs 1 more for each other character in your line of sight.

Name: Air run
Text: Maneuver. You may consume Air. If you do, Radius 1 - push 2 and deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Dark run
Text: Maneuver. You may consume Dark. If you do, Radius 1 - Inflict 2 Soft.

Name: Earth run
Text: Maneuver. You may consume Earth. If you do, create a size 1 Obstacle adjacent to you.

Name: Fire run
Text: Maneuver. You may consume Fire. If you do, your next attack gains Radius +1 or Burst +1.

Name: Ice run
Text: Maneuver. You may consume Ice. If you do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, then exile one of them.

Name: Scry
Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, put one in the discard pile, draw the other one.

Name: Rummaging
Text: Discard any number of cards, draw that many. Lose 2 life.

Name: Preparation
Text: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck, you can't draw cards until your end of turn.

Name: Inspiration
Text: Discard your hand. Draw 2 cards. Exile.

Name: Retry
Text: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck, draw a card.

Name: Blacing shield
Text: Continuous. Defend. Whenever an enemy breaks your Block, deal 2d6 damage to that enemy. You may consume Fire to have that attack gain Burst 2.

Name: Frozen shield
Text: Continuous. Defend. Whenever an enemy breaks your Block, deal 2d6 damage to that enemy. You may consume Ice to inflict 3 Slow to that enemy.

Name: Earthen shield
Text: Continuous. Defend. Whenever an enemy breaks your Block, deal 2d6 damage to that enemy. You may consume Earth to Defend.

Name: Defensive gale
Text: Defend. You may consume Air. If you do, Maneuver.

Name: Wrath
Text: Stance. You deal double damage. You receive double damage.

Name: Elemental sustenance
Text: Consume any number of elements. Draw a card for every 2 elements consumed.

Name: Twilight devotion
Text: Channel Light and Dark. Discard a card, then gain 2 Barrier.

Name: Amplitude devotion
Text: Channel Fire and Water. Gain 2 Pulse, then draw a card.

Name: Horizon devotion
Text: Channel Air and Earth. Gain 1 Slow, then Maneuver.

Name: Tundra devotion
Text: Channel Ice and Nature. Gain 1 Poison, then look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put one into your discard.

Name: Speed up
Text: Gain 1 Haste. Range 3 - target ally gains 1 Haste.

Name: Trustworthy guard
Text: Defend. Radius 1 - each ally gains 1 Empower.

Name: Leeching defense
Text: Defend. Radius 3 - Deal 1d6 damage to each character. For each ally targeted this way, recover 1 health.

Name: Crystal clarity
Text: Radius 3. You may consume Ice and/or Water. Each friendly character may look at the top 1 cards of their deck and put any number of them into their discard. If Ice was consumed, they may look at an additional 2 cards. If Water was consumed, they may draw a card. Inflict 1 Slow to each ally.

Name: Return from soil
Text: Range 5. Target ally may put a card from their discard into their hand. You may consume Earth. If you do, change the range to Radius 5.

Name: Repeating blow
Text: Exile the top 2 cards of your deck, then put this card on top of your deck.

Name: Rise
Text: Channel Earth. Create a Size 1 Obstacle in your space, placing yourself on top of it.

Name: Limit refutal
Text: Maneuver. Strike. This card costs 1 less to play if you are bloodied. This card costs 1 less to play if you have 1 HP.

Name: Fresh ideas
Text: Radius 5. Each ally may exile any number of cards from their hand, then draw that many cards.

Name: Gale blade
Text: Line 4. Strike, then move to the end of the line. Radius 2. Strike. You may consume Air to Push all targets up 3. They fall at the end of your turn.

Name: Perfect turn
Text: Opener. Strike. Strike. Finisher.

Name: Flowing motions
Text: Flow. Maneuver. Gain 3 Counter.

Name: Like water
Text: Permanent. After an enemy attacks you from any range, you may Push them 1 and you may consume Water. If you do, Push +1 and you draw a card.

Name: Breezy rebuttal
Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Consume Air. If you do, teleport to be adjacent to the triggering enemy and Radius 1 - Strike.

Name: Bloody rebuttal
Text: Reaction - you become bloodied. Gain 2 Strength and Defend. You may consume Darkness. If you do, Range 5 - Deal 1d6 damage. Gain half the damage dealt in Barrier. Exile.

Name: Abandon
Text: Gain 1 Nihil. Draw 3 cards, gain 3 Energy.

Name: Novice strike
Text: Strike. Improves after 5 uses. Exile.

Name: Learning fury
Text: Draw a card for each attack you made this turn.

Name: Reposition
Text: Range 5 - Push 4.

Name: Chessboard
Text: Radius 5 - Push 3 any other characters.

Name: Think tank
Text: Permanent. When played, Radius 5 - each friendly character exiles a card from their hand. Friendly characters within Radius 5 may play those cards as though the cards were in their hand.

Name: Shove
Text: Push 1. Draw a card.

Name: Novice Strike
Text: Strike. Improves after 5 uses. Exile.

Name: Call blood
Text: Range 7 - Inflict 5 Bleed.

Name: Cutting gale
Text: Range 5, Burst 2 - Inflict 5 Bleed. You may consume Air. If you do, trigger Bleed on each enemy and reduce their Bleed by 1.

Name: Darkness consumes
Text: Consume Dark. Range 5 - target loses 15 health. Gain 1 Wound.

Name: Burning heels
Text: Radius 5 - inflict 2 Burn to each ally. They gain 2 Haste and may Move 1.

Name: Wariness
Text: Gain 4 Wary. Exile.

Name: Danger call
Text: Radius 1. Each friendly character gains 2 Wary.

Name: Cautious strike
Text: Strike. For each 1 or 2 rolled, gain 1 Warry.

Name: Sea's preparation
Text: Consume Water. Gain 3 Wary. Radius 1 - Push 2.

Name: Aquatic tendril
Text: Range 3 - Push target ally 3. You may consume Water. If you do, target an additional ally.

Name: Pyroport
Text: Range 3 - Teleport target ally to any space within Range 3. You may consume Fire. If you do, increase both ranges by 3 and inflict 3 Pulse to the target and each enemy adjacent to them after they teleport.

Name: Frost guard
Text: Consume Ice. Gain 1 Wary, then gain Block equal to your Wary.

Name: Stand
Text: Continuous. Gain 8 Wary. Whenever an enemy moves into an adjacent space, Strike. Finisher.

Name: Burning approach
Text: Consume Fire. Maneuver, then Radius 1 - Strike. Turn all spaces moved over into Hazardous terrain, dealing 5 fire damage to any character ending their turn on it.

Name: Wary guard
Text: Defend. Gain 2 Wary.

Name: Drag around
Text: Strike an adjacent enemy. Move them to any space adjacent to you.

Name: Novice Strike
Text: Replenish. Inflict 2 Daze to yourself, then shuffle your discard into your deck and draw two cards.

Name: Shade walk
Text: Summon a Shade(3 HP). You may move each Shade 2.

Name: Study
Text: Draw 5 cards. Finisher.

Name: Novice Strike
Text: Strike. Improves after 5 uses. Exile.

Name: Time to watch
Text: Take an extra turn after this one. You may not play cards during that turn. Finisher. Exile.

Name: Approaching counter
Text: Reaction - an enemy within Range 3 attacks. Move 2, then Strike that enemy.

Name: Prepare
Text: Draw 3 cards. Gain 1 Empowered.

Name: Fairy counsel
Text: Summon a Fairy (3 HP, flying, no zone of control). Draw a card for each Fairy. Channel Light.

Name: Soothing draw
Text: Draw 3 cards. Radius 1 - Reduce any number of conditions on each friendly character by 1.

Name: Restock
Text: Draw a card for each other card you've played this turn. Exile.

Name: Steady purging
Text: Permanent. At the end of your turn, look at the top two cards of your deck. You may exile any number of them.

Name: Evasion stance
Text: Stance. At the start of your turn, gain 1 Evasive.

Name: Refuse
Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Ignore all effects from that attack.

Name: Swiftness command
Text: Range 5 - Target ally may maneuver, then play a card. Channel Water.

Name: Burn bright
Text: Exile the top five cards of your deck. You may play them this turn. Channel Fire.

Name: Grant protection
Text: Range 5 - Target ally gains 2 Wary, then may increase any condition by 1.

Name: Owned domain
Text: Radius 5 - Inflict 2 Pulse or 2 Wary to each character. Swap spaces of any two characters.

Name: Sprinting finish
Text: Maneuver. Maneuver. Finisher.

Name: Guarding preparation
Text: Defend. The next card with Strike you play this turn costs 0 energy.

Name: Striking preparation
Text: Strike. The next card with Maneuver you play this turn costs 0 energy.

Name: Moving preparation
Text: Maneuver. The next card with Defend you play this turn costs 0 energy.

Name: Share knowledge
Text: Range 3 - You and target ally each draw 2 cards.

Name: Evade
Text: Gain 3 Evasive.

Name: Evasive order
Text: Radius 2 - Each ally may move 1, then gains 1 Evasive.

Name: Toss and run
Text: Discard 2 cards. Maneuver. Channel Air.

Name: Bloody approach
Text: Consume Air. Maneuver. Radius 2 - Inflict Bleed equal to spaces moved with this card.

Name: Mass retrieval
Text: Radius 1 - Each ally may put a card from their discard into their hand. Channel Earth.

Name: Dust off
Text: Consume Earth. Return a card from your discard to your hand.

Name: Swiftness
Text: Stance. At the start of your turn, gain 1 Haste.

Name: Cheapness
Text: Stance. The first card you play each turn costs 1 less.

Name: Reaching
Text: Stance. Your Strikes gain +1 Range.

Name: Drawing
Text: Stance. At the start of your turn, draw a card.

Name: Barring
Text: Stance. Radius 1 - At the start of your turn, each friendly character gains 1 Barrier.
